amendment.description: To prevent the entry of extremists into the United States under the refugee program, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2899, under the order of 12/3/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 10 - 89. Record Vote Number: 323.

action.text: Point of order that the amendment violates section 313(b)(1)(c) of the CBA withdrawn in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2899.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 313(b)(1)(c) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2899.
Amendment SA 2899 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 2874. (consideration: CR S8350) To prevent the entry of extremists into the United States under the refugee program, and for other purposes.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2899, under the order of 12/3/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 10 - 89. Record Vote Number: 323.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2899, under the order of 12/3/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 10 - 89. Record Vote Number: 323.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2899 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 2874.
